#summary Instructions on how to use NativeLibs4Java from Maven projects
#labels Featured

<wiki:gadget url="http://jnaerator.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/adsense468x60.xml" border="0" width="468" height="60" />

NativeLibs4Java has a Maven repository in which new versions of both binaries and sources of its subprojects are regularly uploaded (only OpenCL4Java, for now).

If you wish to wrap your own native library for Java, you might want to have a look at [http://code.google.com/p/jnaerator/wiki/Maven JNAerator's Maven instructions]

= Repository =

To use [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven NativeLibs4Java's Maven repository], you need to add the following lines to your pom.xml :

{{{
		<repository>
		  <id>nativelibs4java</id>
		  <url>http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
		</repository>
}}}

= Usage = 

  * [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven/com/nativelibs4java/javacl JavaCL] (includes OpenCL4Java)
  {{{
		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.nativelibs4java</groupId>
			<artifactId>javacl</artifactId>
			<version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
			<scope>compile</scope>
		</dependency>
}}}
  * [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven/com/nativelibs4java/scalacl ScalaCL] (includes JavaCL)
  {{{
		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.nativelibs4java</groupId>
			<artifactId>scalacl</artifactId>
			<version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
			<scope>compile</scope>
		</dependency>
}}}
  * [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven/com/nativelibs4java/opencl4java/ OpenCL4Java] (just the raw C bindings)
  {{{
		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.nativelibs4java</groupId>
			<artifactId>opencl4java</artifactId>
			<version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
			<scope>compile</scope>
		</dependency>
}}}
